name: Chicken and Artichoke Bake
recipeIngredient: 6 skinless boneless chicken breasts, cut lengthwise in half

recipeInstructions.text: Drain artichokes. Squeeze all water out of each artichoke. Chop.
Combine artichokes, cheese, mayo, and garlic in a bowl. Mix thoroughly.
Place chicken in a greased 11 x 7 inch baking dish. Spread artichoke mixture over chicken. Bake uncovered at 375F for 30-35 minutes.
